trans-unit.target: 「艾维欣离去之后，我不知道该向谁祈祷。只得孤身一人，独自为逝去姐妹伤心落泪。」

trans-unit.resname: MID·4 | Dauntless Avenger | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: MID·40 | Unruly Mob | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We survived the Travails! Killer angels! Horrors from beyond the moon! Now some big werewolves think they can scare us? Let 'em try."
trans-unit.target: 「我们挺过了癫狂劫！杀人天使！月亮背面的异境惧物！现在有些大狼人觉得他们能吓到我们？但来无妨。」

trans-unit.target: 墓地擅闯客

trans-unit.resname: MID·104 | Graveyard Trespasser | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ward—Discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 守护～弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MID·104 | Graveyard Trespasser | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Graveyard Trespasser enters the battlefield or attacks, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If a creature card was exiled this way, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当墓地擅闯客进战场或攻击时，将至多一张目标牌从坟墓场放逐。如果以此法放逐一张生物牌，则每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MID·104 | Graveyard Trespasser | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
trans-unit.target: 昼形（如果牌手于自己回合中没有施放咒语，则下一个回合成为黑夜。）

trans-unit.resname: MID·104 | Graveyard Glutton | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Graveyard Glutton
trans-unit.target: 墓地饱食兽

trans-unit.resname: MID·104 | Graveyard Glutton | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ward—Discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 守护～弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MID·104 | Graveyard Glutton | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Graveyard Glutton enters the battlefield or attacks, exile up to two target cards from graveyards. For each creature card exiled this way, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当墓地饱食兽进战场或攻击时，将至多两张目标牌从坟墓场放逐。每以此法放逐一张生物牌，每位对手便失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MID·104 | Graveyard Glutton | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
trans-unit.target: 夜形（如果牌手于自己回合中施放至少两个咒语，则下一个回合成为白昼。）

trans-unit.resname: MID·105 | Heirloom Mirror | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Heirloom Mirror
trans-unit.target: 家传魔镜

trans-unit.resname: MID·105 | Heirloom Mirror | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life, Discard a card: Draw a card, mill a card, then put a ritual counter on Heirloom Mirror. Then if it has three or more ritual counters on it, remove them and transform it. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}，支付1点生命，弃一张牌：抓一张牌，磨一张牌，然后在家传魔镜上放置一个仪式指示物。然后如果其上有三个或更多仪式指示物，则移去这类指示物并转化它。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: MID·105 | Heirloom Mirror | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Speak my name thrice, and be rewarded."
trans-unit.target: 「喊名三声，即得回报。」

trans-unit.resname: MID·105 | Inherited Fiend | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 镜中邪鬼

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MID·105 | Inherited Fiend | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Put a +1/+1 counter on Inherited Fiend.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}：将目标生物牌从坟墓场放逐。在镜中邪鬼上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MID·105 | Inherited Fiend | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Well done, young fool, well done! Now for your reward."
trans-unit.target: 「做得好，小傻瓜，做得好！这就是你的回报。」

trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: MID·106 | Hobbling Zombie | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Hobbling Zombie dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
trans-unit.target: 当蹒跚灵俑死去时，派出一个2/2黑色，具败朽异能的灵俑衍生生物。（它不能进行阻挡。当它攻击，在战斗结束时将它牺牲。）

trans-unit.resname: MID·106 | Hobbling Zombie | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I see someone tried to stop you, my pet. How delightful."\n—Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 「好像有人想要阻止你，宝贝。真有趣。」 ～尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MID·107 | Infernal Grasp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ancient evils dwell within the burning chasm called the Ashmouth, ever ready to devour those foolish enough to travel alone.
trans-unit.target: 人称烬口的喷火裂谷内住有古老邪物，随时准备吞噬胆敢单独上路的愚蠢旅人。

trans-unit.resname: MID·108 | Jadar, Ghoulcaller of Nephalia | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jadar, Ghoulcaller of Nephalia
trans-unit.target: 涅非利亚尸鬼牧者贾达

trans-unit.resname: MID·108 | Jadar, Ghoulcaller of Nephalia | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if you control no creatures with decayed, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你未操控具败朽异能的生物，则派出一个2/2黑色，具败朽异能的灵俑衍生生物。（它不能进行阻挡。当它攻击，在战斗结束时将它牺牲。）

trans-unit.resname: MID·108 | Jadar, Ghoulcaller of Nephalia | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Rise, my pretty thing. Why rot in the river when you can serve at my bidding?"
trans-unit.target: 「起身，我的宝贝。如果你能服侍我，又何必烂在河里？」

trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你的总生命正好为13，你可以支付{4}{B}{B}。若你如此作，则转化耶仑。

trans-unit.resname: MID·118 | Olivia's Midnight Ambush | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: When Tainted Adversary enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{B} any number of times. trans-unit.resname: MID·249 | Vampire Socialite | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Vampire Socialite enters the battlefield, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Vampire you control.
trans-unit.target: 当名流吸血鬼进战场时，若有对手本回合中失去过生命，则在每个由你操控的其他吸血鬼上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MID·249 | Vampire Socialite | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: As long as an opponent lost life this turn, each other Vampire you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 只要本回合中有对手失去过生命，每个由你操控的其他吸血鬼进战场时上面便额外有一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MID·250 | Wake to Slaughter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wake to Slaughter
trans-unit.target: 醒转屠戮

trans-unit.resname: MID·250 | Wake to Slaughter | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose up to two target creature cards in your graveyard. An opponent chooses one of them. Return that card to your hand. Return the other to the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 选择至多两张目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌。任一对手从中选择一张。将该牌移回你手上。将另一张牌在你的操控下移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: MID·250 | Wake to Slaughter | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {4}{B}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 返照{4}{B}{R}（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.target: 冬棘祝福

trans-unit.resname: MID·251 | Winterthorn Blessing | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. Tap up to one target creature you don't control, and that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 在至多一个目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。横置至多一个目标不由你操控的生物，且该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: MID·251 | Winterthorn Blessing | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 返照{1}{G}{U}（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: The Celestus
trans-unit.target: 穹天仪

trans-unit.resname: MID·252 | The Celestus | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If it's neither day nor night, it becomes day as The Celestus enters the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前既非白昼也非黑夜，则于穹天仪进战场时成为白昼。

trans-unit.resname: MID·252 | The Celestus | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.resname: MID·252 | The Celestus | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: If it's night, it becomes day. Otherwise, it becomes night. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：如果当前是黑夜，则成为白昼。若否，则成为黑夜。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: MID·252 | The Celestus | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Whenever day becomes night or night becomes day, you gain 1 life. You may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当白昼成为黑夜或黑夜成为白昼时，你获得1点生命。你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MID·253 | Crossroads Candleguide | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 岔路烛光向导

trans-unit.target: {2}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.resname: MID·253 | Crossroads Candleguide | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Do the candleguides' heads turn to follow you as you pass, or is it merely a trick of the flickering light?
trans-unit.target: 到底是烛光向导在你经过时扭头看了你，还是仅为闪烁烛光引起的错觉？

trans-unit.source: By the end of the festival, it was the only thing still grinning.
trans-unit.target: 收成节落幕时，只有它上面还挂着笑脸。

trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}，牺牲月银钥：从你牌库中搜寻一张具法术力异能的神器牌或一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: MID·255 | Moonsilver Key | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 要恢复日夜平衡，就必须用遗失已久的钥匙去打开穹天仪的核心机关～旭金锁。

trans-unit.source: It waited on the barn wall for decades, forgotten, looking for the perfect opportunity.
trans-unit.target: 数十年来，它一直无人问津，静静挂在谷仓墙上等待完美时机。

trans-unit.resname: MID·256 | Mystic Monstrosity | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 于异常之月的光芒下，它借助谷仓大门铰链与稻草拼合而成的四肢昂首挺立。

trans-unit.target: 穿髓金针

trans-unit.resname: MID·258 | Silver Bolt | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When a werewolf charges, you'll only have time for one shot. Best make it count."\n—Captain Eberheart
trans-unit.target: 「狼人冲锋后，你只有射一箭的机会。不要浪费。」 ～船长艾博汉

trans-unit.resname: MID·259 | Stuffed Bear | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 仔细填充野兽尸身令其站立，同时又不失却其原初猎捕本能，这需要超凡技艺的标本师才能做到。

trans-unit.resname: MID·385 | Champion of the Perished | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of the Perished.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个灵俑在你的操控下进战场时，在墓躯斗士上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MID·386 | Triskaidekaphile | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly thirteen cards in your hand, you win the game. {3}{U}: Draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: MID·386 | Triskaidekaphile | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She's always willing to lend a hand. It just won't be her own.

trans-unit.resname: MID·387 | Gavony Dawnguard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gavony Dawnguard
trans-unit.target: 加渥尼护晓兵

trans-unit.resname: MID·387 | Gavony Dawnguard | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ward {1}
trans-unit.target: 守护{1}

trans-unit.resname: MID·387 | Gavony Dawnguard | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If it's neither day nor night, it becomes day as Gavony Dawnguard enters the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前既非白昼也非黑夜，则于加渥尼护晓兵进战场时成为白昼。

trans-unit.resname: MID·387 | Gavony Dawnguard | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever day becomes night or night becomes day, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 每当白昼成为黑夜或黑夜成为白昼时，检视你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以展示其中一张法术力值等于或小于3的生物牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MID·388 | Consider | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Consider
trans-unit.target: 详加考虑

trans-unit.resname: MID·388 | Consider | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 检视你的牌库顶牌。你可以将该牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: MID·388 | Consider | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MID·388 | Consider | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ivold gasped in surprise. Either a very strange insect had crawled onto one of the lenses or he was seeing geists at last!
trans-unit.target: 伊沃德吓得吸了一口气：除非是有特别怪异的虫子爬到镜头前，否则他总算是亲眼看到了游魂！

trans-unit.resname: MID·389 | Infernal Grasp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Infernal Grasp
trans-unit.target: 炼狱之攫

trans-unit.resname: MID·389 | Infernal Grasp | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MID·389 | Infernal Grasp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ancient evils dwell within the burning chasm called the Ashmouth, ever ready to devour those foolish enough to travel alone.
trans-unit.target: 人称烬口的喷火裂谷内住有古老邪物，随时准备吞噬胆敢单独上路的愚蠢旅人。

trans-unit.resname: MID·390 | Play with Fire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Play with Fire
trans-unit.target: 戏火作乐

trans-unit.resname: MID·390 | Play with Fire | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Play with Fire deals 2 damage to any target. If a player is dealt damage this way, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
trans-unit.target: 戏火作乐对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。如果以此法对一位牌手造成伤害，则占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: MID·390 | Play with Fire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Devils find human dwellings to be oppressively cold, dark, and unburnt.
trans-unit.target: 魔鬼发现人类居所过于寒冷、黑暗、缺乏火光生机。

trans-unit.resname: MID·391 | Join the Dance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Join the Dance
trans-unit.target: 携手共舞

trans-unit.resname: MID·391 | Join the Dance | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 派出两个1/1白色人类衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MID·391 | Join the Dance | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {3}{G}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

trans-unit.resname: MID·391 | Join the Dance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We can go into the dark hand-in-hand or alone. I know which I prefer."
trans-unit.target: 「黑暗降临之时，我们可以携手同行，也可孑然面对。我知道我会选哪样。」
